alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Jackson; Lincoln (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 12 at 10:37PM CDT until April 12 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northern Jackson Parish in north central Louisiana... Eastern Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southern Lincoln Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1036 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 12 miles east of Ringgold, or 21 miles west of Jonesboro, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Jackson, eastern Bienville and southern Lincoln Parishes, including the following locations... East Hodge, Brice, Lucky, Eros, Hodge, Simsboro, Liberty Hill, Sailes, North Hodge and Quitman. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
